content: knitted bag for your project > the new version of 0603 project bag is > available now the new version may look the same as the previous one but i added a lot of details to make it looks neater than the previous one it also available in 3 sizes now perfect for your small and much more bigger projects i didn t remove the previous pattern in download section so you can still work on that if you prefer the previous one the new version has interactive video links you can click directly if you use the pdf file enjoy^^ **introduction** this project bag is worked from bottom to top begin by casting on sts using provisional cast on then working back and forth to make the rectangle base then put the cast on sts back to the needles and pick up the sts on both side the body is worked in the round with the help of magic loop method when starting this is to make it easier because you have a base on the bottom part of your work you eventually can let go the magic loop method when your work is long enough the body has the stripes pattern that you work together while making the body finally the body finished after you make a hole for the drawstring and folding the hem the drawstring is worked by i-cord method you can change the drawstring to any drawstring cord if you don t want to make the drawstring **size guide** sizes 1 2 3 base measurements 18 x 6 21 x 11 29 x 11 cm overall measurements 24 x 27 32 x 37 5 40 x 45 5 cm this project bag has 3 sizes size 1 is designed to fit small project like socks or hat size 2 for mid-size project like shawl or maybe kids clothes size 3 for bigger project like adult sweater blanket etc choose the size you d like to knit or just knit it all smile **materials** yarn mc_ 1 2 2 balls of katun seruni by gomerajut 100 g/152 m cc_ 1 1 1 balls of katun seruni by gomerajut 100 g/152 m note katun seruni is a sport weight yarn knitted in 2 strands together for one color in this project pull the end from the inside and the outside or wind it together before you begin or approx 65 85 105 m worsted weight yarn in mc and 35 45 55 m worsted weight yarn in cc needles 4 00 mm circular needles 80 cm long 4 00 mm circular needles 60/40 long depends on the size you ll knit spare needles size lower than 4 00 mm notions scrap yarn & crochet hook for provisional cast on stitch markers tape measurement tapestry needle scissors safety pin **gauge** 19 sts x 29 row = 10 cm x 10 cm in stockinette st on 4 00 mm needles feel free to share your version with hashtag #0603projectbag
